title: Poster, For all you folks who consider a fetus..., 1989
title_raw: For all you folks who consider a fetus...
signed: Imprinted in white, lower right: "SisterSerpents Copyright 1989"
description: Poster for pro-choice campaign.  Black and white photograph reproduction of fetus upseide down with floating text throughout poster. Imprinted in white, across top: "For all you folk who consider a fetus/ more valuable than a woman:"  Imprinted in white, scattered: "HAVE A FETUS COOK FOR YOU", HAVE A FETUS CLEAN YOU HOUSE", HAVE A FETUS AFFAIR", HAVE A FETUS BEAR YOU EGO OFFSPRING", "TRY TO GET A GET TO WORK FOR/ MINIMUM WAGE", "FUCK A FETUS", "JERK OFF TO PHOTOS OF NAKED FETUSES", "CRY ON A FETAL SHOULDER", "GO TO A FETUS HOUSE TO EASE/ YOUR SEXUAL FRUSTRATION".

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, For all you folks who consider a fetus..., 1989. photocopy, rubber-stamped ink, photographic reproduction. Gift of SisterSerpents. 1995-114-1.
